description:
can we replace the animated moving spheres on the home page with something a little more aligned with our goals for small businesses?

Some potential ideas:
Cross-hatch grid animation: implies advanced technology
Connecting grid nodes like a neural network: implies connection and outreach

Consider the best idea, may be create new ones, and implement it.
title: Replace animated spheres with business network animation
